      • getSelectionOptions

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getSelectionOptions()
        Description copied from interface: RasterLayer2
        Returns the list of available selection options for all data contained in this layer. The available selection options are recommended to be a single logical index over the data (e.g. dataset names, imagery types).

        The null option is always implicit and does not need to be specified.

        Returns:
        The available selection options

      • getGeometry

        public Geometry getGeometry​(java.lang.String selection)
        Description copied from interface: RasterLayer2
        Returns the coverage geometry associated with the specified selection.
        Parameters:
        selection - The selection value, may not be null
        Returns:
        The coverage geometry associated with the specified selection
